journal.validation: The journal page title is required to be a non-empty string.

clientenabled.name: Enable 'TinyMCE Everywhere!':
clientenabled.hint: Provides a client setting to enable / disable 'TinyMCE Everywhere!' for a specific user.

cursor.name: Editor cursor location:
cursor.hint: Provides a world setting to place the cursor at the start or end of the editor when initialized.

help.name: Editor toolbar help:
help.hint: Provides a world setting to enable a help button in the editor toolbar for users unfamiliar w/ TinyMCE.

journalenabled.name: Enable for journal editing:
journalenabled.hint: Provides a world setting to enable / disable 'TinyMCE Everywhere!' in journal page editing. When enabled all text page sheets use TinyMCE.
